org.apache.flink.util

类 FlinkException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • org.apache.flink.util.FlinkException
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable
    直接已知子类:
    ClusterDeploymentException, ConfigurationException, ConversionException, DispatcherException, DynamicCodeLoadingException, FlinkJobNotFoundException, FlinkKafka011Exception, HandlerRequestException, JobClientActorConnectionTimeoutException, JobClientActorRegistrationTimeoutException, JobClientActorSubmissionTimeoutException, JobException, JobExecutionException, JobManagerException, ProgramMissingJobException, RestClientException, RestHandlerException, StateMigrationException, StoppingException

    @Public
public class FlinkException
extends java.lang.Exception
    Base class of all Flink-specific checked exceptions.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      FlinkException(java.lang.String message)
      Creates a new Exception with the given message and null as the cause.
      FlinkException(java.lang.String message, java.lang.Throwable cause)
      Creates a new exception with the given message and cause
      FlinkException(java.lang.Throwable cause)
      Creates a new exception with a null message and the given cause.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • FlinkException

        public FlinkException(java.lang.String message)
        Creates a new Exception with the given message and null as the cause.
        参数:
        message - The exception message

      • FlinkException

        public FlinkException(java.lang.Throwable cause)
        Creates a new exception with a null message and the given cause.
        参数:
        cause - The exception that caused this exception

      • FlinkException

        public FlinkException(java.lang.String message,
                      java.lang.Throwable cause)
        Creates a new exception with the given message and cause
        参数:
        message - The exception message
        cause - The exception that caused this exception
